Eric Lin

Life Is Boring

I happen to live in brooklyn and I dislike waking up at 6 to make it to school everyday. I enjoy playing volleyball after school, and I spend most of my time doing homework. What I do everyday is normal, similar to most other students who attend this school. Wake up early, take a bus to school, go home, do homework, sleep, and repeat. I am in no way unique, as my life has already been predetermined by school, and there is no way to escape except drop out.

Top 3 classes in school

  1. AP Comp Sci
  2. Gym
